segments.text: I see a woman drying dishes, completely unaware of the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is flooding, and the water is already pooling on the floor around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even seem to notice the puddle forming beneath her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long the faucet has been running like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children behind her are up to no good, but she’s too focused on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the sound of water splashing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone should really tell her before the whole kitchen floods.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between her calm demeanor and the chaos around her is almost funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she doesn’t slip and hurt herself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene feels like a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
